name: Louis V. JACKVONY, Jr. et al. v. Anthony MONAFO et al.

judges: BEVILACQUA, C. J., did not participate.
parties: Louis V. JACKVONY, Jr. et al. v. Anthony MONAFO et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petitioners’ motion that we reconsider their petition for writ of certiorari and petitioners’ request for oral argument are both denied. R.I., 425 A.2d 86.
BEVILACQUA, C. J., did not participate.

attorneys: William A. Gosz, Providence, for plaintiffs-respondents.
Timothy D. O’Hara, Warren, for defendants-petitioners.
casebody.head_matter:
Louis V. JACKVONY, Jr. et al. v. Anthony MONAFO et al.
No. 80-505-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Feb. 11, 1981.
William A. Gosz, Providence, for plaintiffs-respondents.
Timothy D. O’Hara, Warren, for defendants-petitioners.
